function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Adapting to community measures and guidelines","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of workplace modification framework","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Organizations failing to comply with community measures for controlling covid-19 spread","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of risk management and factors affecting implementation in the workplace","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relocation of operation expenses to workplace modification activities","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate workplace health and safety monitoring","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk management in workplace operations","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective response due to lack of previous experience with risk management","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain future due to pandemic duration and vaccine availability","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Portfolio transformation and technology adoption","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven compliance with community measures","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on office workplace pandemic control","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on administrative control and personal protection for risk control","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of workplace guidance for covid-19 management","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with lockdown procedures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased transmission of covid-19 in the eu/eea and the uk","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of risk identification and assessment for covid-19 in the workplace","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of workplace guidelines for coping with covid-19 community measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear restructuring based on headcounts analysis may lead to ineffective implementation of distancing and personal protection measures.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between physical office space and organizational needs may lead to ineffective workplace modifications and increased risk of disease spread.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on pandemic control in non-clinical workplace theory","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on virtual office space without proper management and safety measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between business strategies and workplace modification plans, leading to increased risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on businesses reliant on office workplace","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Business restrictions increase unemployment and school closures affect educational outcomes","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Policies not uniformly applied across administrative units","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fractional application of policies within administrative units","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of local travel ban accompanying home isolation policies","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of accompanying policies for home isolation in different countries","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Time-varying policy affecting growth rate of infections","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Policy variables not fully enacted","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Grouping of policies may obscure specific effects","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Policy variables at a more granular level than infection data","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unprecedented pandemic outbreak","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on globalization and economic growth as drivers of green investment and sustainable development","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accidental positive effects on the environment and natural ecosystems due to government-imposed measures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recalibration of the global economic growth model from linear to circular economy could impact disease propagation.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced changes may provide opportunities for future resilience, but also present new risks of disease transmission.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 through archival data research and literature review","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reference to historical plagues and pandemics","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stress on healthcare infrastructure","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strain on the economic system","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Localized economic hazards","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global shortages of healthcare equipment such as ppe and ventilators","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shocks to other industries including ce-sensitive materials extraction and mining","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of vital medical equipment such as ventilators and n95 masks","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"National interests and protectionism as a by-product of covid-19 scarcity","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Socio-economic impact of covid-19 leading to a global recession","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Projection of $9 trillion cumulative gdp loss due to covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"}]}
